sentences.en: Almost from the outset, the extravaganza was beset with difficulties.
sentences.cn: 几乎从一开始, 这一盛事就被种种困难所困扰.

sentences.en: Beset by ethnic strife, the province remains ungovernable.
sentences.cn: 该省因受种族冲突困扰而失控。

sentences.en: But the European effort was beset by ambivalence at its core.
sentences.cn: 但是欧洲的这种努力从根本上说是充满了矛盾.

sentences.en: Fancy an old friend of yours not lending you a hand when you are beset with difficulties.
sentences.cn: 亏得他还是你的老朋友,你有困难他都不帮忙.

sentences.en: In the swamp the army was beset by mosquitoes.
sentences.cn: 在沼泽地,该军受到蚊子的困扰.

sentences.cn: 这是个为各种内城常见问题所困扰的社区。

sentences.en: Riddled with a thousand gaping wounds , this reactionary clique is now beset with difficulties and contradictions both in internal and external affairs.
sentences.cn: 今天, 这个反动集团百孔千疮,内外交困,矛盾重重.

sentences.en: She wanted to enjoy her retirement without being beset by financial worries.
sentences.cn: 她想享受退休生活而不必为金钱担忧.

sentences.en: The discussions were beset with difficulties.
The feeling which beset the child was one of dim uncertain horror.
sentences.cn: 困恼着这孩子的感情乃是一种虚无缥缈的恐怖.

sentences.en: the injuries which have beset the team all season

sentences.en: The unhappy mother was beset by terrible anxiety.
sentences.cn: 她心里又极忧愁,又很难过,不晓得这个日子怎样过得下去.

sentences.en: This town is beset with towering mountains.
sentences.cn: 这座城市为高山所环抱.
